name: Exanima
notes: Run time error during installation (v0.6.4.3e). Now sure why.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Examina/Exanima.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
